doc.title: Brian vs. the Cat
doc.plot: BRIAN VS. THE CAT is an urban fairy tale, and Sally is the modern day damsel in distress. Single, independent, with a great job, Sally feels completely fulfilled. Well, almost . . . Refusing to believe that any personal emptiness could be appeased by a man, Sally decides to get a cat. Ah, Women and cats! I think it has something to do with unconditional love or biological clocks or. . . something. But this is not a movie about biological clocks, or cat ladies, so men out there need not worry, because now into our story enters. . . Brian. Brian is Sally's would-be-knight-in-shining-armor. Only Brian is allergic to cats, and let's just say the cat makes the best out of a difficult situation.
